product_name: Exped SIM Comfort Duo 7.5 Sleeping Pad
long_description: The self-inflating, insulated Exped SIM Comfort Duo 7.5 Sleeping Pad provides winter warmth for couples during car-camping trips. It also works well in a camper van or at home as a guest bed. Laminated polyester surface fabric is durable, airtight and humidity resistant; nonslip finish keeps you on the pad. Velvety soft tricot top surface for next-to-skin comfort. Uses high-grade open-cell polyurethane foam for efficient warmth. R-value equals 6.4; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). It can also be folded in half and secured with the rip-and-stick strips along the edges for use as an extra-thick single mat. Pad self-inflates, but an Exped accessory pump (sold separately) can be used to speed inflation. Exped SIM Comfort Duo 7.5 Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit.
short_description: The self-inflating, insulated Exped SIM Comfort Duo 7.5 Sleeping Pad provides winter warmth for couples during car-camping trips. It also works well in a camper van or at home as a guest bed.
